awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 23 nominations.

fullplot: After Paul D. finds his old slave friend Sethe in Ohio and moves in with her and her daughter Denver, a strange girl comes along by the name of "Beloved". Sethe and Denver take her in and then strange things start to happen...
plot: Based on the book by Toni Morrison, in which a slave is visited by the spirit of her deceased daughter.
title: Beloved

tomatoes.consensus: A powerful, emotional and successful film adaptation of the original novel.
